publication.abstract: We presen t a new algorithm for computing the capacitance of three-dimensional perfect electrical conductors of complex structures. The new algorithm is significantly faster and uses muc h less memory than previous best algorithms, and is kernel independent.The new algorithm is based on a hierarchical algorithm for the n-body problem, and is an acceleration of the boundary-element method for solving
